threshold_otsu.title: threshold_otsu
threshold_otsu.externalImports:
import imagej
import scyjava as sj
ij = imagej.init('sc.fiji:fiji:2.14.0')
threshold_otsu.codeGenerator:
function code(inputs, outputs, node, generator) {
          const code = `#Get input image
vp_input_image = ${inputs[1]}
#Get Op Name
Op_name = "threshold.otsu"
#Convert input image to Java type
process_image = vp_input_image.get('value')
#Process image by Op
${outputs[1]}= ij.op().run(Op_name, ij.py.jargs(None,process_image))
#Normalization to range (0,255), uint8 
${outputs[1]} = ij.py.from_java(${outputs[1]})
${outputs[1]} = ((${outputs[1]} - ${outputs[1]}.min()) / (${outputs[1]}.max() - ${outputs[1]}.min())* 255).astype('uint8')
#Display result
def image_info(image):
    # A handy function to print details of an image object.
    print("--- After Edge Preserve Smoothing ---")
    ij.py.show(image)
    print(f" type: {type(image)}")
    print(f"dtype: {image.dtype if hasattr(image, 'dtype') else 'N/A'}")
    print(f"shape: {image.shape}")
    print ("--------------------------------")
image_info(${outputs[1]});
#Prepare output metadata
${outputs[1]} = {
  'value': ${outputs[1]},
  'dataType': 'numpy.ndarray',
  'metadata': {
    'colorChannel': 'grayscale',
    'channelOrder': 'channelLast',
    'isMiniBatched': False,
    'intensityRange': '0-255',
    'device': 'cpu'
  }
}
${outputs[0]}`;
          return code;
        }

output_image.title: image
output_image.tooltip: {dataType: numpy.ndarray, value, layout: [chw], colorMode: [rgb, grayscale], intensityRange: 0-255' device: cpu}
